    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceId

        public java.lang.String getInstanceId()
        Description copied from interface: GamePad
        Returns the ID for this GamePad. When supported by the driver, if multiple gamepads are connected each will have a unique instance id. Otherwise, this will fallback for to the name of the device returned by the driver. If a gamepad is unplugged and reconnected, it will have the same ID.
        Specified by:
        getInstanceId in interface GamePad
        Overrides:
        getInstanceId in class LibgdxGamePad
        Returns:
        The unique ID when possible, otherwise the generic ID
